hackathon.question_00.mp3: what bizarre but essential skill do you bring to a hackathon team (like pizza-summoning or bug-whispering)?
hackathon.question_01.mp3: if your ideal project was a flavor of ice cream, what would it taste like?
hackathon.question_02.mp3: are you the type to dive into chaos headfirst, or do you like to create a five-step battle plan before touching code?
hackathon.question_03.mp3: what’s the most ridiculous programming language or tool you secretly love?
hackathon.question_04.mp3: when the code doesn’t compile and the deadline looms, what’s your emergency move: screaming, snacks, or black magic?
hackathon.question_05.mp3: describe a time you solved a problem so obscure that even the computer seemed confused.
hackathon.question_06.mp3: if hackathons had designated sleep shifts, would you volunteer for the 4 a.m. 'brain fog' slot?
hackathon.question_07.mp3: what’s the strangest project idea you’d still defend with your life?
hackathon.question_08.mp3: how do you react when your code breaks, but the error message is just a shrug emoji?
hackathon.question_09.mp3: is there a tech concept you hope no one asks you about because it feels like programming dark arts?
hackathon.question_10.mp3: do you go for ‘hacky hacks’ or do you have an almost unholy dedication to writing code that works elegantly?
hackathon.question_11.mp3: what’s the one bug-fixing trick that makes you feel like a wizard?
hackathon.question_12.mp3: if you could have any fictional character as a teammate, who would it be (no rational choices allowed)?
hackathon.question_13.mp3: you’re presented with the option to build a solution OR duct-tape everything together—what do you choose?
hackathon.question_14.mp3: what's one thing about your work style that might throw your teammates off at first (in a charming way)?
hackathon.question_15.mp3: do you enjoy hyping the project up in the final pitch, or are you more about ‘behold, my terrible creation’?
hackathon.question_16.mp3: imagine a hackathon with unlimited funding and 1 rule: you can’t code a single line—what do you build?
hackathon.question_17.mp3: what’s the most overhyped tech trend you’d mock ironically but still use?
hackathon.question_18.mp3: when the code is cursed and nothing works, do you pray to the silicon gods or embrace the chaos?
hackathon.question_19.mp3: if your ideal teammate had to be half-person, half-machine, which half would be machine, and why?

quirky.question_00.mp3: if you could create a holiday, what kind of chaos would you unleash on the world?
quirky.question_01.mp3: what song are you secretly convinced would end all world conflicts if everyone just listened to it on repeat?
quirky.question_02.mp3: if you had to haunt someone like a ghost, what annoying thing would you do to them every day?
quirky.question_03.mp3: if your life was a reality TV show, what weird challenge would contestants face to impress you?
quirky.question_04.mp3: what’s the oddest food that you genuinely believe deserves a Michelin star?
quirky.question_05.mp3: if you could only communicate through one meme format for the rest of your life, which would it be?
quirky.question_06.mp3: if you were an urban legend, what would your special powers be, and how would people summon you?
quirky.question_07.mp3: you’ve just been given $1,000 in Monopoly money, redeemable only for odd life hacks—what do you buy?
quirky.question_08.mp3: what’s your favorite ‘useless’ conspiracy theory that makes you laugh or scares your friends?
quirky.question_09.mp3: if every time you entered a room a song had to play, which track would be your curse?
quirky.question_10.mp3: if you had to live in one meme forever, which would you choose? (no regrets allowed)
quirky.question_11.mp3: you’re banished to a random fictional world—where would you land if you wanted max drama?
quirky.question_12.mp3: if you could wake up tomorrow with an animal's instincts, which creature’s brain would you borrow?
quirky.question_13.mp3: what’s a ‘party trick’ skill you’re proud of but will never admit on LinkedIn?
quirky.question_14.mp3: if you had to haunt an appliance, which one would you choose, and how would you terrorize its owner?
quirky.question_15.mp3: guilty pleasure song, but make it the theme song for your personal brand. what’s the vibe?
quirky.question_16.mp3: you’ve been cursed to only smell like one thing forever—what’s your signature scent?
quirky.question_17.mp3: what’s your dream pet, no matter how mythical or inconvenient it would be?
quirky.question_18.mp3: if you could challenge anyone, real or fictional, to a duel, who would it be and why?
quirky.question_19.mp3: if you had to complete one ridiculous goal before you die, what would it be (no logic required)?
quirky.question_20.mp3: if you're trapped on an island with a bracket bot, what would you do?
